title: PS5 Pro Teased by PlayStation 30th Anniversary Ad - Kinda Funny Games Daily 09.06.24
description:
Head over to Kindafunny.com/DragonAge to listen and subscribe to Dragon Age: Vows & Vengeance!

This episode is sponsored by BetterHelp — go to http://betterhelp.com/kindafunny to get 10% off your first month.

More hints of a PS5 Pro, new details on Starfield’s new DLC, and Concord’s final day is here.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
GAMESCAST - is our Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2 Review
Game Showdown is right after.
The STREAM is more Warhammer 40K: Space Marine 2 w/ Mike, Roger, and Bless
If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
You can get today’s Gregway
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Delaney Twining & Karl Jacobs

00:00:00 - Start
00:06:00 - Housekeeping
The Roper Report   -
00:07:55 - PlayStation’s 30th Anniversary logo could include a PS5 Pro tease - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:33:15 - Ad  
00:35:15 - Starfield's New Planet Has Over 50 New Locations, Bethesda Reveals - Wesley Yin-Poole @ IGN
00:43:10 - Fans Wave Goodbye to Concord as It Goes Dark — Maybe Forever - Wesley Yin-Poole @ IGN
00:49:55 - Shinji Mikami thought Tango Gameworks would be safe from closure if it made more Hi-Fi Rush games - Ed Nightingale @ Eurogamer
00:53:10 - Wee News!
00:55:58 - You‘re Wrong
00:57:10 - SuperChats
